Package me.julb.applications.bookmark.controllers

Class MyItemController

java.lang.Object
me.julb.applications.bookmark.controllers.MyItemController
@RestController @Validated @RequestMapping(path="/my/items", produces="application/json") public class MyItemController extends Object
The rest controller to manage items.
